name: Andrew Porras's Shut Up and Dab!
name_original: Andrew Porras's Shut Up and Dab!
description:
Please maximize the game window when playing

This game is an Xmas gift for my old team. Based on true events.

Try to dab as many times in one minute behind your boss's back. 

Hold Space to Stand, and dab with the down-arrow keys (while standing).

Enjoy!

Art by Brittany Lollis

Music is the Bulk and Skull theme from Mighty Morphin Power Rangers
